short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks distracting websites and helps you manage your time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop procrastinating and start managing your time with Slate. It blocks websites that you deem unproductive, ensuring that you stay on track. Using the scheduling tool, you can add tasks and breaks throughout your day, and Slate will stop blocking distracting websites when you're taking a break.
